statements.statement: SELECT x.ID , a.ProductNo , a.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , a.ProductName , e.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , d.BrandCnName , d.BrandEnName , x.CategoryNo AS HotCategoryNo , x.Sortvalue , x.Status , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY Sortvalue DESC ) AS row FROM SpProduct a INNER JOIN SWfsIndexHotProductListTemp x ON a.productno = x.productno LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS e ( NOLOCK ) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS d ( NOLOCK ) ON a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo WHERE e.TypeFlag=1 AND x.DataState = 1 AND x.status = 1 AND x.CategoryNo = @CategoryNo

SELECT sku.ProductNo, sku.PcShowState AS IsShelf , sku.PcShelfDate as DateShelf , skuPri.GoldPrice AS SellPrice , skuPri.PlatinumPrice , skuPri.DiamondPrice , skuPri.StandardPrice AS LimitedPrice , skuPri.MarketPrice , skuPri.PromotionPrice FROM SpfSkuExtend AS sku ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS skuPri ( NOLOCK ) ON skuPri.SkuNo = sku.SkuNo WHERE sku.PcShowState = 1 AND sku.PcSaleState = 2 AND sku.DataState = 1 AND sku.ProductNo = @ProductNo
update SWfsIndexHotProductListTemp set DataState=255 where ID=@ID

with temp as (select a.ProductNo, a.ProductModel as GoodsNo, e.Status, a.ProductName, e.ProductShowPic as ProductPicFile, a.BrandNo, c.BrandCnName, c.BrandEnName,row_number() over(order by e.CreateDate desc) as row from SpProduct as a with(nolock) INNER join SpfProductExtend as e(nolock) on e.ProductNo=a.ProductNo INNER JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend skue (NOLOCK) WHERE skue.PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS t ON t.ProductNo=a.ProductNo left join SpBrand as c with(nolock) on a.BrandNo = c.BrandNo where e.TypeFlag=1 and a.DataState = 1 and e.ProductShowPic <> '' and e.Status=1 and e.DataState=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductType=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end ) select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize
select sortvalue from SWfsIndexHotProductListTemp where Status=1 and DataState=1 and CategoryNo=@CategoryNo
select CategoryNo,ProductNo from SWfsIndexHotProductListTemp where Status=1 and DataState=1 and CategoryNo=@CategoryNo and ProductNo=@ProductNo
